npcSpeech.text: Ahoi. These are deserted lands. It is pleasing to see a sight such as you.
The highlands, seventy clicks from Mestreyk.
I was a lawyer. I worked many years for the farmers union... but that has passed. Now I travel and read fortunes for a living.
Curious. Perhaps you have not arrived at your current position yet.
These rocks are tricky. It is not always easy to find your way through them
